content: Cryptocurrency Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Aug 2019What your views on Infireum?Heard lots of people talking about Infireum, what your view on it? How is it different from other crypo like bitcoin?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Mike Ferrer, Head Of Community Management at TenXLevel 3. WonderkidUpdated on 13 Sep 2019Honestly, I've never heard of this coin or project until you mentioned it. A quick Google search shows it has very little volume and is only trading on 2 exchanges: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/infireum/trading_exchanges#panelAlso, there's not much info, updates or announcements from the official channels of the team:https://infireum.com/https://medium.com/@infireumglobalhttps://twitter.com/infireumI can't find a whitepaper or description of the technology they use for their coin or blockchain. There's no info on the official website about the team either.A deeper search shows that it's probably a scam:https://deadcoins.com/entry/3839/?gvid=1308https://topcoinslist.com/scamcoin/IFR?switchLang=truePlease be careful and always do your research.1 comment1

Mike Ferrer13 Sep 2019Just want to issue a clarification on what I said above after doing a bit more research that I was hasty in calling it ‚Äúprobably a scam‚Äù. Just to explain where I was coming from, I care very much about the community, be it here in our Seedly personal finance community and also the larger crypto community and was perhaps a bit too protective when I interpreted the researched links online. After digging a bit deeper and getting in touch with their team I admit making the mistake, so sincerest apologies to the Infireum team, I did not mean to be rude or to damage the reputation of your project üôè
